item.title: How to Connect to AWS via VS Code
item.description:
Prerequisites

  • VS Code
    • VS Code Remote-SSH extension installed
  • AWS
    • Port 22 is open
    • Private key PEM file downloaded

Step-by-Step Guide

  1. Create a new connection in VS Code’s Remote-SSH
  2. Configure the file as follows:
Host aws
HostName ${ip}
User ec2-user
Port 22
IdentityFile ${pem}$

Where:

  • HostName is the EC2 instance IP
  • IdentityFile is the path to your downloaded PEM file

Notes

  • PEM file permissions need to be modified: chmod 400 ${pem}
